head: Video surveillance solutions
pain:
by far the most informative system in the technical security direction. 
 We use more opportunities thanks to technologies, special algorithms and artificial intelligence
solutions: Video analytics, development of solutions based on situational platforms:
content: - creating of various architectures of video surveillance systems (security and technological television)
- installation and configuration of systems for local and distributed objects with a single center for processing and storing information
- development of solutions for face and number recognition systems using artificial intelligence
- integration of various video analytics systems and other security systems with video surveillance systems into a single information structure based on situational platforms
